import React,{useState}from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StanleyCupSim(){const teams=useSelector(state=>state.teams);const[selectedTeam,setSelectedTeam]=useState("NYR");const[gameResults,setGameResults]=useState([]);const[wins,setWins]=useState([]);const[losses,setLosses]=useState([]);const selectTeam=teamAbbrev=>{setSelectedTeam(teamAbbrev);};// Runs a simulation against all other teams. Win % is based on the difference between both team's win % + 50% base.
const runSim=selectedTeam=>{const selectedTeamWinPctg=teams.find(team=>team.teamAbbrev.default===selectedTeam).winPctg;let wins=0;let losses=0;let results=[];teams.forEach(team=>{if(team.teamAbbrev.default!==selectedTeam){let winProbability=50+(100*selectedTeamWinPctg-100*team.winPctg);const randomNum=Math.floor(Math.random()*101);let result;if(winProbability>randomNum){wins++;result='win';}else{losses++;result='loss';}results.push({opponent:team.teamAbbrev.default,winProbability:winProbability.toFixed(2),result:result});}});setWins(wins);setLosses(losses);setGameResults(results);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Welcome to the ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("s",{children:"Stanley Cup"})," Season Simulator!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"team-info",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"How It Works"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Select a team and click the Run Simulation button. From there, your team will faceoff against each other team one time!"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"team-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Choose a Team!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:teams.map(team=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"team",onClick:()=>selectTeam(team.teamAbbrev.default),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"team-icon",src:team.teamLogo,alt:"team logo"}),team.teamName.default," (",team.teamAbbrev.default,")",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"arrow",children:" \u2197"})]},team.teamAbbrev.default))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Selected Team"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:selectedTeam}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>runSim(selectedTeam),children:"Run Simulation"})," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Simulation Results"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Wins: ",wins]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Losses: ",losses]}),gameResults.map((result,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Opponent: ",result.opponent,", Win Probability: ",result.winProbability,"%, Result: ",result.result]},index))]})]})]})]});}export default StanleyCupSim;
